Package model

Class Movie

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Movie

  • public class Movie
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Movie which contains its listings.
    Since:
    2017-11-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Meiru

    • Constructor Detail

      • Movie

        public Movie​(int movieId,
             java.lang.String movieName,
             java.lang.String synopsis,
             java.lang.String director,
             java.lang.String cast,
             MovieShowingStatus status,
             int duration)
        Creates a new Movie with its listings. It will check based on this if the movie is available for booking.
        Parameters:
        movieId - MovieID of the movie.
        movieName - Movie name.
        synopsis - Synopsis of the movie.
        director - Director of the movie.
        cast - Cast of the movie.
        status - Showing status of the movie.
        duration - Duration of the movie.

      • Movie

        public Movie​(int movieId,
             java.lang.String movieName,
             java.lang.String synopsis,
             java.lang.String director,
             java.lang.String cast,
             MovieShowingStatus status,
             double avg_rating,
             boolean isShowing,
             double ticketSales,
             int duration,
             java.util.Calendar showingEndDate,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> reviews,
             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> ratingList)
        Creates a new Movie with its listings. This constructor is called by the loading of database.
        Parameters:
        movieId - MovieID of the movie.
        movieName - Movie name.
        synopsis - Synopsis of the movie.
        director - Director of the movie.
        cast - Cast of the movie.
        status - Showing status of the movie.
        avg_rating - Overall rating of the movie.
        isShowing - Status of the movie if it can be booked.
        ticketSales - Ticket sales of the movie.
        duration - Duration of the movie.
        showingEndDate - Showing end date of the movie.
        reviews - Reviews of the movie.
        ratingList - Ratings of the movie.
